title: Keeping Up with the Kardashians
summary: Keeping Up with the Kardashians (often abbreviated KUWTK) is an American reality television series which focuses on the personal and professional lives of the Kardashianâ€“Jenner blended family. Its premise originated with Ryan Seacrest, who also served as an executive producer. The series premiered on the E! cable network on October 14, 2007, ran for 20 seasons, and became one of the longest-running reality television series in the US. The final season premiered on March 18, 2021.[2][3]
